CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Retail Placement stage positioned above or below the Product Concept stage?
SRP.A: The Retail Placement stage is positioned {below} the Product Concept stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Launch in Market?
VE.A: The value of stage Launch in Market is {972}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Product Concept?
VE.A: The value of stage Product Concept is {4687}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Product Concept, with a value of {4687}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Retail Placement, with a value of {865}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Product Concept to stage Taste Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {2344} Thousand Bottles from stage Product Concept to stage Taste Testing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {1371} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1657? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Product Concept} stage has {4687}, the {Taste Testing} stage has {2343}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 918? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 432 and 3515? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Taste Testing} stage has {2343}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {972}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {865}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Product Concept} to {Taste Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing, from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Product Concept} to stage {Taste Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Product Concept} and {Taste Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Launch in Market} and {Retail Placement} stages.
